name: Pamarthi Deepthi Ramani

Demonstrates excellent problem-solving abilities and expertise in data structures and algorithms. Seeking a challenging role to leverage skills in developing advanced MERN stack applications.

projects.name: Food Delivery website using MERN Stack
projects.description: Developed a food delivery website using the MERN stack with an admin panel for user management, menu item editing/deletion/addition, and order management. Integrated a cart system and secure payment gateway for hassle-free transactions.

projects.name: Pinterest clone
projects.description: Developed a Pinterest clone using HTML, CSS, JS, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB. Implemented features such as user authentication, image uploading, and saving pins functionalities. Employed modern web development practices to create a responsive and visually appealing platform.

experiences.description: Researched AI/ML algorithms and their applications in biomedical technology. Implemented projects using algorithms like Back Propagation and SVM.
